name: Ponxiety
description:
The year is 2132, and you're humanity's last hope!

Your people have created a powerful super AI codename "SkyNOT" which has gained self-awareness and lust for murder. Taking over all of the planet Earths defence systems, it demands to be entertained by competing against them in a classic game of Pong... And you're the chosen one! Win and humanity shall prevail. Lose, and humanity's hope will be lost forever! You only have to score four points to win!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ponxiety is the first game I've ever worked while learning Lua and Love2D. Instead, it's a game that came from CS50 course & Kyle Schaubs course that opened me up to Love2D dev, but I wanted to give its personal touch! By all means, the game isn't perfect, but it's a creation that I'm happy with, and one that taught me a lot.
